subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Lars Eller broke a tie midway through the second period, and Max Pacioretty added a goal the third to give the Montreal Canadiens a 3-1 victory over the visiting Rangers on Saturday night.
snippet: Lars Eller broke a tie midway through the second period, and Max Pacioretty added a goal the third to give the Montreal Canadiens a 3-1 victory over the visiting Rangers on Saturday night.
